hyp_text: Julia Gillard, ameŋɔdzeƒe kple Gbagblewo, dɔwɔƒe ƒe 2010 ƒe fedɔlɔ me ɖe kple ƒe ɖoɖo, kple dɔwɔƒe ƒe ɖoɖo ɖe Australia va zu kple ƒe gã le ƒe Queen Elizabeth II ƒe tɔtrɔkpa me.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ewe]: {"translation": "Amewo tu toŋugblewo ɖe teƒe glidzaglidzawo, anyigba ƒe atsyɔ̃ɖoƒewo vaseɖe agakpe siwo te ɖe ƒua ŋu le ƒe alafa geɖe siwo va yi me."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ewe]: {"translation": "Le tomemi gago akpe ɖeka ɖuɖu vɔ megbe le Fairbanks anyiehe le Alaska la, wotu Trans-Alaska amipɔmpigakpo meta 800"}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ewe]: {"translation": "Egbe egbe Belgium ƒe akpa aɖewo nɔ Luxembourg me va yi, ke wova zu Belgium dukɔ ƒe akpa aɖe le ƒe 1830 ƒe Belgium Tɔtrɔkpatawo ƒe Ʋiʋli megbe."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src_text: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
ref_text: Mɔ si le Point Marion kple Fairmont dome la yɔ fũu kple ʋukuku kuxi siwo de dzi wu le Buffalo-Pittsburgh mɔdodo la dzi, si nye gbememɔ si tso abo la dzi toto zi geɖe.
hyp_text: Mɔ̃ ɖe Point Marion le Fairmont tu, dɔwɔƒe ɖe ɖuɖuɖu wɔnɔnɔ le Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, siwo ɖe ɖe ƒuɖuɖuɖuɖuɖu ƒe atɔ̃ɖoƒe siwo le ƒuɖuɖuɖuɖu ƒe atɔ̃ɖoƒe ƒe ƒuɖuɖuɖuɖu ƒe atɔ̃ɖoƒe siwo le ƒuɖuɖuɖuɖu ƒe atɔ̃ɖoƒe.

src_text: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
ref_text: Woke ɖe Anyiehe Shetland Ƒukpowo ŋu le 1819, eye dukɔ geɖewo gblɔ be yewoe ke ɖe eŋu eye nugɔmekuƒe geɖewo le edzi. Le ƒe 2020 me la, nugɔmekuƒe siwo nɔ afi ma la ƒe xexlẽme nye 16.
hyp_text: Gbe Shetland ƒe ga, agbe ɖe 1819, si ɖe ɖe wɔmɔ aƒe kple ɖe ƒe gaƒoƒo ƒe ga, gbe 16 ɖe ƒe gaƒoƒo 2020 me.

[Ewe]: {"translation": "Amewo tu toŋugblewo ɖe teƒe glidzaglidzawo, anyigba ƒe atsyɔ̃ɖoƒewo vaseɖe agakpe siwo te ɖe ƒua ŋu le ƒe alafa geɖe siwo va yi me."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ewe]: {"translation": "Le tomemi gago akpe ɖeka ɖuɖu vɔ megbe le Fairbanks anyiehe le Alaska la, wotu Trans-Alaska amipɔmpigakpo meta 800"}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ewe]: {"translation": "Egbe egbe Belgium ƒe akpa aɖewo nɔ Luxembourg me va yi, ke wova zu Belgium dukɔ ƒe akpa aɖe le ƒe 1830 ƒe Belgium Tɔtrɔkpatawo ƒe Ʋiʋli megbe."}
